body.description: Introducing IQ BUILDER's STEM Learning Toy - the key to unlocking your child's potential and preparing them for a bright and successful future! Our brand new and unique set of educational toys is specially crafted with a strong emphasis on Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM) learning. Designed to flex mental muscles and engage the cognitive parts of the brain, our toys promote the development of critical thinking, reasoning, and problem-solving skills. Empower Through Education: IQ BUILDER's STEM building toys are teacher-recommended and have been embraced by educational professionals worldwide. This building set has found its way into preschool and elementary school classrooms, enriching children's cognitive abilities. The STEM activities offered by IQ BUILDER are not only enjoyable but also foster a love for learning that lasts a lifetime. The Best Gift for Young Minds: Searching for the perfect gift for a child? Look no further! IQ BUILDER is the best gift you can give to help children learn and grow. From birthday gifts for 6-year-old boys to toys for 7-year-old boys and beyond, our STEM learning toy is a hit with kids of various ages. Don't miss the chance to give the gift of education and fun combined! Top-Requested Brain Toy: Our STEM building set is one of the top-requested brain toys among children. Teachers rave about IQ BUILDER, endorsing it as the best STEM kids building engineering toy for both boys and girls. Kids ask to play with it again and again, making it a favorite among parents, educators, and children alike. Explore the World of STEM: People have searched far and wide for educational toys, and IQ BUILDER stands out as a top choice. Whether it's art and crafts, engineering toys for kids aged 5-7, educational toys for 6-year-olds, or building sets for boys aged 8-12, our STEM learning toy covers it all. Foster a passion for learning with IQ BUILDER, a versatile and engaging tool for children's growth and development. Don't miss out on the opportunity to empower your child with the skills they need for a successful future. IQ BUILDER is not just a toy; it's a gateway to a world of learning and discovery. Invest in your child's education today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality building toy!
reviews.reviewText: My son has 2 sets of these. They are perfect for building and creating all types of ideas. They keep him busy for hours and he has enjoyed them for several years. So much so, that he asked for another set recently for his birthday. They are well made and a great stem toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A well received gift for creative children.
reviews.reviewText: It is a fine building toy limited only by one’s creativity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sat and built as a family. Great toy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun and versatile
reviews.reviewText: My daughter (3.5) has been playing with this for over two years and liked it so much that we purchased a second set. The pieces fit together at different angles, which allows for a lot of creativity with assembly. Our only problem was the wheels; the axel pieces broke very quickly, leaving us without functional wheels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It challenges my kids to use their minds to build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oh, one of the best toys
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My son is 5 and he uses this a lot. He creates spinners, and tall imagination things, and this is one of the best items for him to use creativity. Easy to assemble and so much fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, great customer service
reviews.reviewText: This is a versatile set which is great fun to use with my 3 1/2 year old. We have enjoyed building many things together, including several of the models in the instruction book, which I found easy to follow. He has been able to use his own ideas to make original creations. As he gets older I anticipate he will be able to build things on his own, including some of the more advanced models given in the instruction book. There is a good range of difficulty from very easy to much more challenging, so I think this will provide entertainment for many years. I emailed the company to request some more of the little connecting pieces as we had a few ideas of extra things to build using them. They immediately replied and sent some more of those pieces at no extra cost. I highly recommend this product and this company!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No instruction book
reviews.reviewText: How do we get an instruction booklet which is mentioned in many of the reviews. We did not receive one.
I bought this as a gift for my friend’s son. I was expected they will come with the box just like in the picture but they came in a plastic contender. Don’t know how am going to wrap them 😞
I bought this for my four year old. Based on the good reviews I thought I was getting a good deal.. It comes with no instructions.

Great design and easily assembled and disassembled.Brightly colored and offering different tactile experiences, patterns and connectivity.A great deal fun... AND learning/teaching aid. Enhances kinetic and visual learning.A good buy

Good idea for kids but is not sturdy enough for my 5 Y/O... some of the balls are starting to separate and I found it a bit lacking in terms of allowing combinations.. the set seems big at the beginning but once he starts playing with it he always manage to finish all the pieces and not having enough to complete its ideas.
Some of the items in the box came broken when I received it yesterday. If possible another box would be appreciated.
